verses.roman:
tabe hāsi' nityānanda vasilā āsane
cāri kuṇḍī āroyā ciḍā rākhilā ḍāhine

synonyms: tabe hāsi'-thereupon smiling; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; vasilā āsane—sat down on His seat; cāri kuṇḍī—four earthen pots; āroyā ciḍā—chipped rice not made from boiled paddy; rākhilā ḍāhine—He kept on His right side.
translation: Then Nityānanda Prabhu smiled and sat down. On His right side He kept four pots of chipped rice that had not been made from boiled paddy.
